This folder contains a mathematical library to ease usage of bigdecimal along with mathematical functions such as pow, root...

The jar file was obtained by running "make" inside the anc folder of the library source archive (http://arxiv.org/src/0908.3030v3)

Author page : http://arxiv.org/abs/0908.3030v3

Some description : https://stackoverflow.com/questions/16441769/javas-bigdecimal-powerbigdecimal-exponent-is-there-a-java-library-that-does
